bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition with sudden outbreaks and frequently changing appearances that do not show a regular pattern. Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 8 Recipe Entry Bian Que xian shui wan 扁鵲陷水丸 , Bian Que’s pills for immersion in water : 腹內脹病，中惡邪氣，飛屍遊走，皆服 二丸如小豆 , “For a disease of abdominal distension, when one has been struck by malign and evil qi, and if flying corpse [ qi ] roves around, in all these cases ingest two pills the size of a small bean”.
